review: This has some really good features and some not so good featuresGood:+Boots fast+Nice remote+Low power draw+Supports many streaming services+Voice search is cool and works wellNot so good:-No Yahoo Screen support-Unit powers down when the TV is off.  I was kinda hoping to stream music through my audio system with the TV off but when the TV shuts down the Fire TV does as well.-UI is really biased towards Amazon services.  For example voice search only works on Amazon.All in all this is a really nice device but part of me wishes I had purchased a Roku 3 instead.  It might be a little bit better.

review: If you are in the market for a streaming media player this is the one. The combination of this little unit and prime are awesome. Prime still has a little way to go still with content but can't really complain with the other benefits. Also added ability to children's games on it and music is a bonus too. Can't really go wrong.
